[center][img]http://i62.tinypic.com/jgk2lt.png[/img][/center]
[center][size=5]WOW! [/size][size=6][b]25,000 [/b]total views! I'm speechless![/size][size=5]
[/size][/center]
[center][b][u][color=#6fa8dc][size=4]
Why did I decide to create this mod?[/size][/color]
[/u][/b][size=3]There are a lot of magic mods out there, but I found most of them to be quite overpowered or just not really fitting into the game. Some of them are just recreating spells with stronger effect (like healing 60 per second instead of 10), any spell in this pack is NEW. In vanilla Skyrim, the most powerful spell that you can have is a fireball or ice spear that you don't even need to master in order to use them.. not too exciting when trying to be a badass mage. This mod adds new EXTREME spells to make being a badass master-blaster mage possible! All spells are awesome, cool and balanced spells that fit the atmosphere of Skyrim. These spells are vanilla based, and comparable with any texture mod as they are using existing files, making it a perfect part of any magic lover's gameplay.
[/size][/center]================================================================================================================================
[size=3][color=#ffd966]If enough people want we to make this mod possible to auto-install with mod loaders and things like that I'll get on to it, [/color][center][color=#ffd966]although it's rather unnecessary as the mod is [b]EXTREMELY[/b] easy to install. [b]EXTREME!! [/b][/color][/center]
[/size]

===================================================================================================================================[color=#6fa8dc][size=3][b][u]How does one gets the spell tomes? (temporary)[/u][/b][/size][/color]
[size=2]In order to find extreme destruction spells, go to [/size][b]Dragonsreach[/b][size=2] and enter [/size][b]Farengar Secret-Fire's room[/b][size=2] (to the right of the long table). Once you're there go you'll see an [/size][b]entrance to another room near the enchanting/alchemy table[/b][size=2] (some mods modify it). [/size][b]Enter the room[/b][size=2] and [/size][b]look to your right[/b][size=2], you should see a [/size][b]pile of spell tomes on a table[/b][size=2].

Fire Burst and Extreme Ice Spear can be bought from [b]Farengar Secret-Fire.[/b] Enjoy!

[/size][size=3][b]I will add the spell tomes to some merchants around Skyrim, but for now you can only find it in Dragonsreach[/b][/size]

[b][size=5]If you find any bugs/glitches or you have any ideas please be sure to submit a comment. Tnx![/size][/b]
